force.description:
Disables safe-sync behaviour while performing synchronisation.
This operation can be destructive - use it with absolute caution.

interactive.description: Causes SourceDrive to describe and seek user permission the resulting synchronisation operation.

sync.description:
Safe-syncs the specified directory if it is marked as a SourceDrive repository.
If no directory is provided, the current directory is used.

dir.description: The directory to be sychronised. Must be marked as a SourceDrive repository.

force.description:
Disables safe-sync criteria during the recursive search for directories to synchronise.
This operation can be destructive - use it with absolute caution.

interactive.description: Causes SourceDrive to describe and seek user permission for each resulting synchronisation operation.

sync-search.description:
Safe-syncs all directories marked as SourceDrive repositories nested within the specified directory.
If no directory is provided, the current directory is used.
Nested repositories are identified recursively, but only those meeting safe-sync requirements are targeted.

dir.description: The directory within which SourceDrive should recursively search for SourceDrive repositories to be synchronised.
